lines.text: [a hacker has messed up the CHP's payroll]
Yeah, I've got a car payment due!
Settle down! Just settle down and we'll try to sort out your paychecks.
Well, how much was YOUR paycheck?

[nervously]
It's... more than I usually get.
It's closer to what I deserve.
[Jon announces his proposal for a trail bike task force]
I'd like to nominate my partner, Frank Poncherello.
Hey, that's great. 'Cause when we first met, I was on a dirtbike.
Uh, no, Ponch. When we first met, you had just fallen off a dirtbike.
